label: DATV TX Pluto (v5)
info:
- Low latency only for libx265/264, will break ffmpeg otherwise
 - Round trip latency fiddles 4s => 2s
   - Yes I do mind that the round trip is 4s...
 - Update DATV-TX.bat!!! VERY IMPORTANT
 - Other profiles grey when one active
 - Stopping profile also stops transmission
 - perhaps we could call ffmpeg directly...

name: Global: mute
Pluto connection status
Mute OFF
func:
let run = msg.payload
let topic = "cmd/pluto/" + global.get("call")+ "/tx/mute"
msg.topic = topic
msg.payload = run
return msg;

name: Mute ON
func:
let run = msg.payload
let topic = "cmd/pluto/" + global.get("call")+ "/tx/mute"
msg.topic = topic
msg.payload = run
return msg;

info:
## Pluto beta mqtt firmware TX dash

### Thanks to DL5OCD_Michael for sending these flows

## DATV-TX.bat has been modified for this to work please find the latest version here
 - Please update DATV-TX.BAT to use the profiles
   - They are the profiles that are setup in DATVNotSoEasy, set them up according to your needs **and** update the profile button names accordingly
 - Run node-red from DATVNotSoEasy directory
